summary_strategy: Reframe summary around building and operating secure, production-grade platform systems with measurable operational reliability—emphasizing cross-functional ownership, deployable controls, and AI-augmented tooling aligned with OpenAI’s FDE mission
skills_strategy: Use condensed 3-line format to prioritize high-priority skills most relevant to platform engineering: Security Engineering & Automation, Cloud/Platform & Integrations, and Security Data/AI—grouping tools under clear functional themes without listing every tool

experience_focus.must_highlight: deployable controls with operational reliability, cross-team IAM/security automation, asset reconciliation and API-driven integrations
experience_focus.safe_metrics_to_keep: 25 percent compliance improvement, 200 hours saved annually, 30 percent reduction in user-reported issues
experience_focus.claims_to_avoid: no invented metrics, no speculative ownership scale (e.g., avoid 'enterprise-scale' without source), no unverified tool claims beyond listed evidence

risk_controls: Replace all 'built X to do Y' with 'delivered X with operational reliability for Y',
